metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9465 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The yr_arena_write_data function in YARA 3.6.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read and application crash) or obtain sensitive information from process memory via a crafted file that is mishandled in the yr_re_fast_exec function in libyara/re.c and the _yr_scan_match_callback function in libyara/scan.c.

criterions.comment: yara package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7.1-1ubuntu2').
